title: Hearty Breakfast Scramble
description: A quick and satisfying breakfast scramble packed with eggs, crispy bacon, savory mushrooms, and vibrant bell peppers. Perfect for a weekend brunch or a substantial weekday meal.

instructions.instruction: Saut√© vegetables: Add diced bell pepper and sliced mushrooms to the skillet with olive oil or butter. Cook over medium heat for 5-7 minutes, until vegetables are tender-crisp. Remove vegetables from the skillet and set aside.
Scramble the eggs: In a medium bowl, whisk the eggs with milk or cream (if using), salt, and pepper until well combined. Pour the egg mixture into the same skillet over medium-low heat.

Finish the scramble: As the eggs begin to set, gently push them from the edges towards the center with a spatula. When the eggs are mostly set but still slightly moist, return the cooked vegetables to the skillet. Gently fold everything together until heated through.

author: Chowboy AI
